Hi all,

I was trying to order my discovered uris with the KeyWordUriPreced=
encePolicy for the URIs and the HighestUriQueuePrecedencePolicy for the que=
ues.

I'm assigning every outCandidate uri a certain value (1, 10, 20, 30, =
70, 100) in a post processor (after LinkScoper).

From my understanding all=
 URIs with the value 1 should be processed first, then those with value 10 =
and so on...

For some reason my crawl doesn't seem to use the precedence v=
alues and the policies and the crawl is processed like a regular crawl with=
out policies.

I can retrieve the set values when the uris actually get cra=
wled but the order is not right!

Is there any setting I have to change bes=
ides adding the policies?
 
This will be (hopefully) my last question and t=
hen I can finish my master thesis on my ontological crawler based on Heritr=
ix! Thanks for all the help at this point, especially to Gordon!

Georgie
